verses.verse: <S%G3588><s%> But On The <S%G1161><s%> Of The <S%G1520><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Week <S%G4521><s%> Mary <S%G3137><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Magdalene <S%G3094><s%> Comes <S%G2064><s%> Early <S%G4404><s%> Dark <S%G4653><s%> Still <S%G2089><s%> It Being <S%G5607><s%> To <S%G1519><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Tomb, <S%G3419><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Sees <S%G991><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Stone <S%G3037><s%> Taken Away <S%G142><s%> From <S%G1537><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Tomb. <S%G3419><s%>

She Runs <S%G5143><s%> Therefore <S%G3767><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Comes <S%G2064><s%> To <S%G4314><s%> Simon <S%G4613><s%> Peter <S%G4074><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> To <S%G4314><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Other <S%G243><s%> Disciple <S%G3101><s%> Whom <S%G3739><s%> Loved <S%G5368><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Jesus, <S%G2424><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Says <S%G3004><s%> To Them, <S%G846><s%> They Took Away <S%G142><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Lord <S%G2962><s%> Out Of <S%G1537><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Tomb, <S%G3419><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3756><s%> We Know Not <S%G1492><s%> Where <S%G4226><s%> They Laid <S%G5087><s%> Him. <S%G846><s%>

Went Forth <S%G1831><s%> Therefore <S%G3767><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Peter <S%G4074><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Other <S%G243><s%> Disciple, <S%G3101><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Came <S%G2064><s%> To <S%G1519><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Tomb. <S%G3419><s%>

<S%G5143><s%> And Ran <S%G1161><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Two <S%G1417><s%> Together, <S%G3674><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Other <S%G243><s%> Disciple <S%G3101><s%> Ran Forward <S%G4390><s%> Faster <S%G5032><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Than Peter, <S%G4074><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Came <S%G2064><s%> First <S%G4413><s%> To <S%G1519><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Tomb, <S%G3419><s%>
And <S%G2532><s%> Stooping Down <S%G3879><s%> He Sees <S%G991><s%> Lying <S%G2749><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Linen Cloths; <S%G3608><s%> Not <S%G3756><s%> However <S%G3305><s%> He Entered. <S%G1525><s%>

Comes <S%G2064><s%> Then <S%G3767><s%> Simon <S%G4613><s%> Peter <S%G4074><s%> Following <S%G190><s%> Him, <S%G846><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Entered <S%G1525><s%> Into <S%G1519><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Tomb, <S%G3419><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Sees <S%G2334><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Linen Cloths <S%G3608><s%> Lying, <S%G2749><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Handkerchief <S%G4676><s%> Which <S%G3739><s%> Was <S%G2258><s%> Upon <S%G1909><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Head <S%G2776><s%> His, <S%G846><s%> Not <S%G3756><s%> With <S%G3326><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Linen Cloths <S%G3608><s%> Lying, <S%G2749><s%> But <S%G235><s%> By Itself <S%G5565><s%> Folded Up <S%G1794><s%> In <S%G1519><s%> A 1520 A-ASM Place. 5117 N-ASM

Then <S%G5119><s%> Therefore <S%G3767><s%> Entered <S%G1525><s%> Also <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Other <S%G243><s%> Disciple <S%G3101><s%> Who <S%G3588><s%> Came <S%G2064><s%> First <S%G4413><s%> To <S%G1519><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Tomb, <S%G3419><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Saw <S%G1492><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Believed; <S%G4100><s%>

<S%G3764><s%> For Not Yet <S%G1063><s%> Knew They <S%G1492><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Scripture, <S%G1124><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> It Behooves <S%G1163><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> From Among The <S%G1537><s%> Dead <S%G3498><s%> To Rise. <S%G450><s%>
Went Away <S%G565><s%> Therefore <S%G3767><s%> Again <S%G3825><s%> To <S%G4314><s%> Their Home <S%G1438><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Disciples. <S%G3101><s%>

<S%G3137><s%> But Mary <S%G1161><s%> Stood <S%G2476><s%> At <S%G4314><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Tomb <S%G3419><s%> Weeping <S%G2799><s%> Outside. <S%G1854><s%> As <S%G5613><s%> Therefore <S%G3767><s%> She Wept, <S%G2799><s%> She Stooped Down <S%G3879><s%> Into <S%G1519><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Tomb, <S%G3419><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Beholds <S%G2334><s%> Two <S%G1417><s%> Angels <S%G32><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> White <S%G3022><s%> Sitting, <S%G2516><s%> One <S%G1520><s%> At <S%G4314><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Head <S%G2776><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> One <S%G1520><s%> At <S%G4314><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Feet, <S%G4228><s%> Where <S%G3699><s%> Was Laid <S%G2749><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Body <S%G4983><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of Jesus. <S%G2424><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Say <S%G3004><s%> To Her <S%G846><s%> They, <S%G1565><s%> Woman, <S%G1135><s%> Why <S%G5101><s%> Weepest Thou? <S%G2799><s%> She Says <S%G3004><s%> To Them, <S%G846><s%> Because <S%G3754><s%> They Took Away <S%G142><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G2962><s%> My Lord, <S%G3450><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3756><s%> I Know Not <S%G1492><s%> Where <S%G4226><s%> They Laid <S%G5087><s%> Him. <S%G846><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> These Things <S%G5023><s%> Having Said <S%G2036><s%> <S%G4762><s%> She Turned <S%G1519><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Backward, <S%G3694><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Beholds <S%G2334><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Standing, <S%G2476><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3756><s%> Knew Not <S%G1492><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> It Is. <S%G2076><s%>

Says <S%G3004><s%> To Her <S%G846><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Jesus, <S%G2424><s%> Woman, <S%G1135><s%> Why <S%G5101><s%> Weepest Thou? <S%G2799><s%> Whom <S%G5101><s%> Seekest Thou? <S%G2212><s%> She <S%G1565><s%> Thinking <S%G1380><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Gardener <S%G2780><s%> It Is, <S%G2076><s%> Says <S%G3004><s%> To Him, <S%G846><s%> Sir, <S%G2962><s%> If <S%G1487><s%> Thou <S%G4771><s%> Didst Carry Off <S%G941><s%> Him, <S%G846><s%> Tell <S%G2036><s%> Me <S%G3427><s%> Where <S%G4226><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> Thou Didst Lay, <S%G5087><s%> And I 2504 P-1NS-C Him 846 P-ASM Will Take Away. 142 V-FAI-1S

Says <S%G3004><s%> To Her <S%G846><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Jesus, <S%G2424><s%> Mary. <S%G3137><s%> Turning Round <S%G4762><s%> She <S%G1565><s%> Says <S%G3004><s%> To Him, <S%G846><s%> <S%G4462><s%> Rabboni, <S%G3739><s%> That Is To Say, <S%G3004><s%> Teacher. <S%G1320><s%>

Comes <S%G2064><s%> Mary <S%G3137><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Magdalene <S%G3094><s%> Bringing Word <S%G518><s%> To The <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3101><s%> Disciples <S%G3754><s%> She Has Seen <S%G3708><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Lord, <S%G2962><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> These Things <S%G5023><s%> He Said <S%G2036><s%> To Her. <S%G846><s%>

<S%G5607><s%> It Being Therefore <S%G3767><s%> Evening <S%G3798><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G2250><s%> On That Day, <S%G1565><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> First Day <S%G1520><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of The Week, <S%G4521><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Doors <S%G2374><s%> Having Been Shut <S%G2808><s%> Where <S%G3699><s%> Were <S%G2258><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Disciples <S%G3101><s%> Assembled, <S%G4863><s%> Through <S%G1223><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Fear <S%G5401><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Jews, <S%G2453><s%> Came <S%G2064><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Stood <S%G2476><s%> In <S%G1519><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Midst, <S%G3319><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Says <S%G3004><s%> To Them, <S%G846><s%> Peace <S%G1515><s%> To You. <S%G5213><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> This <S%G5124><s%> Having Said <S%G2036><s%> He Shewed <S%G1166><s%> To Them <S%G846><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Hands <S%G5495><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Side <S%G4125><s%> Of Himself. <S%G846><s%> Rejoiced <S%G5463><s%> Therefore <S%G3767><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Disciples <S%G3101><s%> Having Seen <S%G1492><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Lord. <S%G2962><s%>

Said <S%G2036><s%> Therefore <S%G3767><s%> To Them <S%G846><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Again, <S%G3825><s%> Peace <S%G1515><s%> To You : <S%G5213><s%> As <S%G2531><s%> Has Sent Forth <S%G649><s%> Me <S%G3165><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Father, <S%G3962><s%> I Also <S%G2504><s%> Send <S%G3992><s%> You. <S%G5209><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> This <S%G5124><s%> Having Said <S%G2036><s%> He Breathed Into Them, <S%G1720><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Says <S%G3004><s%> To Them, <S%G846><s%> Receive The <S%G2983><s%> Spirit <S%G4151><s%> Holy : <S%G40><s%>

<S%G302><s%> Of Whomsoever <S%G5100><s%> Ye May Remit <S%G863><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Sins, <S%G266><s%> They Are Remitted <S%G863><s%> <S%G846><s%> To Them; <S%G302><s%> Of Whomsoever <S%G5100><s%> Ye May Retain, <S%G2902><s%> They Have Been Retained. <S%G2902><s%>

Said <S%G3004><s%> Therefore <S%G3767><s%> To Him <S%G846><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Other <S%G243><s%> Disciples, <S%G3101><s%> We Have Seen <S%G3708><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Lord. <S%G2962><s%> <S%G3588><s%> But He <S%G1161><s%> Said <S%G2036><s%> To Them, <S%G846><s%> <S%G1437><s%> Unless <S%G3361><s%> I See <S%G1492><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G5495><s%> His Hands <S%G846><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Mark <S%G5179><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Nails, <S%G2247><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Put <S%G906><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Finger <S%G1147><s%> My <S%G3450><s%> Into <S%G1519><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Mark <S%G5179><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Nails, <S%G2247><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Put <S%G906><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G5495><s%> My Hand <S%G3450><s%> Into <S%G1519><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G4125><s%> His Side, <S%G846><s%> <S%G3756><s%> Not At All <S%G3361><s%> Will I Believe. <S%G4100><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> ' After <S%G3326><s%> Days <S%G2250><s%> Eight <S%G3638><s%> Again <S%G3825><s%> Were <S%G2258><s%> Within <S%G2080><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3101><s%> His Disciples, <S%G846><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Thomas <S%G2381><s%> ' With <S%G3326><s%> Them. <S%G846><s%> Comes <S%G2064><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Jesus, <S%G2424><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Doors <S%G2374><s%> Having Been Shut, <S%G2808><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Stood <S%G2476><s%> In <S%G1519><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Midst <S%G3319><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Said, <S%G2036><s%> Peace <S%G1515><s%> To You. <S%G5213><s%>

Says <S%G3004><s%> To Him <S%G846><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Jesus, <S%G2424><s%> Because <S%G3754><s%> Thou Hast Seen <S%G3708><s%> Me, <S%G3165><s%> Thomas, <S%G2381><s%> Thou Hast Believed : <S%G4100><s%> Blessed <S%G3107><s%> <S%G3588><s%> They Who <S%G3361><s%> Have Not Seen <S%G1492><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Have Believed. <S%G4100><s%>

<S%G4183><s%> Many <S%G3303><s%> Therefore <S%G3767><s%> Also <S%G2532><s%> Other <S%G243><s%> Signs <S%G4592><s%> Did <S%G4160><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> In Presence <S%G1799><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3101><s%> Of His Disciples, <S%G846><s%> Which <S%G3739><s%> <S%G3756><s%> Are Not <S%G2076><s%> Written <S%G1125><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G975><s%> This Book; <S%G5129><s%>

<S%G5023><s%> But These <S%G1161><s%> Have Been Written <S%G1125><s%> That <S%G2443><s%> Ye May Believe <S%G4100><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Is <S%G2076><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Son <S%G5207><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of God, <S%G2316><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> That <S%G2443><s%> Believing <S%G4100><s%> Life <S%G2222><s%> Ye May Have <S%G2192><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Name <S%G3686><s%> His. <S%G846><s%>
